title: Uncommon Criminals - Ally Carter.epub
description:
Katarina Bishop has worn a lot of labels in her short life. Friend. Niece. Daughter. Thief. But for the last two months sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s simply been known as the girl who ran the crew that robbed the greatest museum in the world. There are only three problems. First, the gem hasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t been seen in public in thirty years. Kat might be in way over her head, but sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not going down without a fight. Which means, this time, Katarina Bishop is making up her own rules.
